# Установка MariaDB

## установка

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    dnf -y install mariadb mariadb-server
:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/03.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::


## настройка

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    mysql_secure_installation

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/07.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::

## запуск

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    mysql -u root -p

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/08.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::

## база данных по умолчаню 

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    SHOW DATABASES;

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/08.jpg)

# Создание базы данных

## создать базу данных

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    CREATE DATABASE addressbook CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci;

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/10.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::


## создать таблицу

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    CREATE TABLE city(name VARCHAR(40), city VARCHAR(40));

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/10.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::


## заполнять таблицу

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    INSERT INTO city(name,city) VALUES ('Иванов','Москва');

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/11.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::

## изблекать из таблицы

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    SELECT * FROM city;
    
:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/12.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::


## дать права доступа к учетной записи

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    CREATE USER user@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'password';
    GRANT SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE ON addressbook.* TO user@'%';
    FLUSH PRIVILEGES;

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/13.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::

## смотреть таблицу

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    mysqlshow -u root -p
    mysqlshow -u root -p addressbook
    mysqlshow -u user -p addressbook

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/14.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::


# Резервные копии

## backup

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    mysqldump -u root -p addressbook > /var/backup/addressbook.sql
    mysqldump -u root -p addressbook | gzip > /var/backup/addressbook.sql.gz
    mysqldump -u root -p addressbook | gzip > $(date +/var/backup/addressbook.%Y%m%d.%H%M%S.sql.gz)


:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/15.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::

## восстановление базы данных из backup

:::::::::::::: {.columns align=center}
::: {.column width="70%"}

    mysql -u root -p addressbook < /var/backup/addressbook.sq
    zcat /var/backup/addressbook.sql.gz | mysql -u root -p addressbook

:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![](./image/16.jpg)

:::
::::::::::::::
